frontend/hooks/useKeyboardShortcuts.ts.description: Custom hook for keyboard shortcuts with input field detection (input/textarea/select/contenteditable), case-insensitive key matching, and proper cleanup on unmount. Uses the same pattern as AboutModal.tsx for keydown events.

frontend/app/page.tsx.description: Main page integrates useKeyboardShortcuts hook for quick filter keyboard shortcuts: A (airports), M (military), T (today), V (verified 3+), R (reset), F (toggle panel). Shortcut map is memoized with useMemo for stable reference.
